name: ip-num
description: A TypeScript library for working with IPv4, IPv6 and ASN numbers. It provides representations of these internet protocol numbers with the ability to perform various IP related operations like parsing, validating etc. on them

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run compile && rm -rf ./dist/spec && cp package.json README.md ./dist/src && webpack --config ./webpack.config.js && typedoc --out ./docs ./src/ --exclude '**/spec/*.ts' && touch ./docs/.nojekyll && git add . && git commit -m 'updating documentation and dist for release'
scripts.ipnum-release-dry-run: npm run prepublishOnly && npm publish ./dist/src --dry-run && npm run clean
scripts.ipnum-release: npm run prepublishOnly && npm publish ./dist/src && npm run clean
scripts.ipnum-release-major: npm version major && npm publish ./dist/src && npm run clean
scripts.ipnum-release-minor: npm version minor && npm publish ./dist/src && npm run clean
scripts.ipnum-release-patch: npm version patch && npm publish ./dist/src && npm run clean
scripts.ipnum-release-preminor: npm version preminor && npm publish ./dist/src && npm run clean
scripts.ipnum-release-prepatch: npm version prepatch && npm publish ./dist/src && npm run clean
scripts.ipnum-release-prerelease: npm version prerelease && npm publish ./dist/src && npm run clean

author: Dadepo Aderemi
